definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: This is important because of the widespread consumption of white rice.
sentences.chinese: 这很重要，因为人们广泛食用白米。

sentences.english: Can we have two plain steamed rice and one fried rice, please?
sentences.chinese: 我们可以要两份白米饭和一份炒饭吗？

sentences.english: The rice they gave us lasted for a month.
sentences.chinese: 我们获分配的白米够一个月食用。

sentences.english: The main course of roughage will surely causes you longer time than the rice and flour.
sentences.chinese: 粗粮的主食吃起来也肯定比白米白面慢。

sentences.english: However, white rice is essentially a starch.
sentences.chinese: 然而，白米饭基本上是淀粉。

sentences.english: That's two boiled and one fried.
sentences.chinese: 两份白米饭和一份炒饭。

sentences.english: But it goes through a milling process that removes many nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 但白米在碾磨加工过程中会流失很多营养成分。

sentences.english: It occurs where people have to exist on a starchy staple food such as cassava or polished white rice.
sentences.chinese: 以木薯或精白米等淀粉为主食的人群是疾病多发群体。

sentences.english: That's two boiled rice and one fried.
sentences.chinese: 两份白米饭和一份炒饭。

sentences.english: White rice has become especially prevalent because of its long shelf life.
sentences.chinese: 白米饭已成为普遍的粮食作物是因为它的保质期长。

sentences.english: Men can not always eat rice, it is good for health to eat some cereals.
sentences.chinese: 人不能总吃白米饭，吃点五谷杂粮也是有益健康的。

sentences.english: Why, for a handful of rice every day, do they risk their lives?
sentences.chinese: 就为了每日几碗白米，便以命相搏？

sentences.english: Examples of these foods are applesauce, bananas, white rice, oatmeal, and refined wheat bread.
sentences.chinese: 苹果酱，香蕉，精白米，燕麦粥以及精制小麦面包。

definition: grain crops other than rice and wheat
sticky rice/short-grain rice/Oryza sativa var. japonica
long-grained rice (Indian rice, as opposed to round-grained rice 粳米[jing1 mi3])
